means: 巴西利卡塔（意大利南部一地区，与第勒尼安海湾和特兰多海毗邻，它形成了意大利“长靴”形版图的鞋面）

means.word_mean: 1. a region of southern Italy (forming the instep of the Italian `boot')

auth_sentence.content: Set in southern Italy, Matera, Basilicata is a little-known glinting jewel with scenery that is more moonscape than landscape.
auth_sentence.res_content: Set in southern Italy, Matera, Basilicata is a little-known glinting jewel with scenery that is more moonscape than landscape.
